section.title: Type-Safe Map
section.para: The drawing editor supports editing of the properties of the figures in a drawing. The number of properties is not known at the implementation-time of the drawing framework.
We do not want to use reflection for accessing property accessor methods of a JavaFX Bean.
We can define a type named Key<V> which can be used as the key for a map.
The type parameter <V> of the key can be used to create type-safe map accessors of the style <V> V get(Key<V> key).
These type safe map accessors can be defined in this key class, or alternatively, in a type-safe map class.
